reviewer_info: Posted by Badar Munir on Apr 03, 2017
familiarity: Familiarity: I did not own this car, but have driven this car.
review_text:
I just happened to drove one in Pakistan and found it to be an excellent car in terms of engine pickup, fuel economy and drive comfort. The Toyota C-HR has a 1.8 hybrid engine which is very powerful indeed. The shape is beautiful and has all the options
And comes with an original 18 inch rim. I have also driven the Honda vezzel which has a 1.5 hybrid engine which has a much higher consumption as the engine is very weak compared to its body size. 

I would rate Toyota C-HR as the best hybrid I have driven so far like Prius, Camry, vezzel.

A wonderful and beautiful car com keep it ndees
